page.title: 06Totteridge The Past.
page.content: {Totteridge House Farm}used to be in the same place where they built the new one. In the middle of{Totteridge {Lane}there was a{rubbish tip}where people put their{rubbish.}We then went to see a man called{John.}He has lived in the area for{85 years.}He likes the area. Every year at his{school}they used to have a{paper chase}where one boy used to{run}along with a{bag}full of{paper}and at the end they all used to get an{acid drop}each. On the {common}they used to tie up{donkeys}and {goats.}The{cattle}from{Totteridge Farm {House}used to{walk}all over the place. People used to{ride}about on{horse}and {carts.}The old people we talked to were over{80.}They were very nice to {interview.
